job.description: ltpgtLakarya is Hiring for one our ClientsltpgtltpgtltstronggtPosition Data Scientist Data AnalystltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtLocation Highpoint NCltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtJob type Long term ContractltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtJob DescriptionltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtManage administration and supervise the development of logistics policies and programs to ensure they meet the changing conditions in program requirementsltligtltligtPrepare and present membership changes to large audience including senior staff using PowerPointltligtltligtDevelop reports using IBM Cognos as part of the migration of a particular customerltligtltligtCodedMaintain a SAS program including embed SQL written by consultants for use in manual claim forecastingltligtltligtAnalyze the existing BO universe and provide the guidelines to migrate and implementation effect of CognosltligtltligtDevelop dashboards and trend reports that keep track of utilization volume cost and quality performanceltligtltligtServe as project officerteam leader provide direction and guidance to contractors and support to DoD personnelltligtltligtInvolve in development for highly complicate reports scorecards and dashboards for a specific business needs and performance improvementltligtltligtDevelop routine SAS macros to create tables graphs and listings for inclusion in reports and maintain existing onesltligtltligtDevise new improve procedure by use of VBA to create campus tables that saves time and ensures accuracyltligtltulgtltpgtJob Types Fulltime Contractltpgt
